knowledge.progressSummary: SURVEYED: Created Lean formalization of unique product representation count F(A,B). Defined productSet, representationCount, F, and maxF. Axiomatized van Doorn bounds. Main problem OPEN.
insights: Problem is OPEN - estimate max F(A,B) for unique products
Upper bound: O(N²/(log N)^0.086 (log log N)^(3/2)) (van Doorn)
Gap factor: (log N)^0.914 (log log N)^(3/2) - grows unboundedly
Connects to multiplicative energy and sum-product theory
mathlibGaps: Finset.sup over powerset product may need care
nextSteps: Explore specific constructions achieving lower bound
Connect to sum-product theory in Lean
